Returns: A ViewHolder for the Row's View.
Parameters: ViewGroup: The parent View for the Row's view holder.
createRowViewHolder(android.view.ViewGro.Description: Called to create a ViewHolder object for a Row. Subclasses will override this method to return a different concrete ViewHolder object.

isUsingDefaultSelectEffect().Description: Returns true if this RowPresenter is using the default dimming effect. A subclass may (most likely) return false and override @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#onSelectLevelChanged_E@.

getOnActionClickedListener().Description: Returns the listener for Action click events.

getBackgroundColor().Description: Returns the background color. If no background color was set, transparent is returned.

isStyleLarge().Description: Returns true if the layout style is large.

setStyleLarge(boolean).Description: Sets the layout style to be large or small. This affects the height of the overview, including the text description. The default is large.

setBackgroundColor(int).Description: Sets the background color. If not set, a default from the theme will be used.

ClassDesc: Use @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FullWidthDetailsOverviewRowPresenter_E@ Renders a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewRow_E@ to display an overview of an item. Typically this row will be the first row in a fragment such as the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#DetailsFragment_E@. The View created by the DetailsOverviewRowPresenter is made in three parts: ImageView on the left, action list view on the bottom and a customizable detailed description view on the right. The detailed description is rendered using a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Presenter_E@ passed in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewRowPresenter#DetailsOverviewRowPresenter_E@. Typically this will be an instance of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#AbstractDetailsDescriptionPresenter_E@. The application can access the detailed description ViewHolder from @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewRowPresenter#ViewHolder#mDetailsDescriptionViewHolder_E@. To participate in activity transition, call @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DetailsOverviewRowPresenter#setSharedElementEnterTransition_E@ during Activity's onCreate(). Because transition support and layout are fully controlled by DetailsOverviewRowPresenter, developer can not override DetailsOverviewRowPresenter.ViewHolder for adding/replacing views of DetailsOverviewRowPresenter. If further customization is required beyond replacing the detailed description, the application should create a new row presenter class.
